CHAT.comment: Looking at books , Chloé and Victor argue.
This file is the sixth of a series of seven (23a to 23g) for the same session. Mathilde is present but doesn't say anything.
Room next to the classroom where the children have their afternoon nap. A table and chairs are added for our sessions.

u.a: Nina leaves the room . I do too .
the plastic toy Victor is holding belongs to the kitchen area of the classroom .
Mathilde joins in . I come back .
showing Victor how to hold the pen .
the flap that lifts the hat in the book is broken .
Victor bangs him on the head with his plastic hammer .
William , Dylan , Chloé , Lisa , and Carla come in .
